mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM t_comment tc LEFT JOIN t_custom tc2 ON tc.userId = tc2.id LEFT JOIN t_image_database tid ON tc2.imageId = tid.id

SELECT tc2.id AS userId, tc2.username AS nickName, tc.id AS commentId, tc.content, tc.click, CONCAT(tid.path,'/',tid.name) AS userPic FROM t_comment tc LEFT JOIN t_custom tc2 ON tc.userId = tc2.id LEFT JOIN t_image_database tid ON tc2.imageId = tid.id
ORDER BY tc.createDate DESC
